page.title: 17COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: COMMUNICATIONS through the area are fairly good as we have in the village a railway station enabling any one from the area to go away by train . They may also get to the railway station by car as there are good road ways to and from the station. The road system in the area is important as it also allows local people to travel to the town or city which could be over 45 miles away. Roads are important as well because those people without their own transport can use the local bus service that passes through the villages about once per hour daily.
